    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:melt.cup.cam.ac.uk:cahi1:data_102397</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>lre</catalog>
            <entry>cahi1:data_102397</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="fr">La lumière voyage en ligne droite en brûlant une installation comprenant une bougie</string>
            <string language="en">Light travels in a straight line  burning candle setup</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Licht reist in eine gerade Geraden brennende 
Kerzeinstallation</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">A luz viaja em uma linha reta instalação 
ardente da vela</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">La luce viaggia in una linea retta messa a punto 
burning della candela</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ελαφριά ταξίδια σε μια οργάνωση κεριών καψίματος 
ευθειών γραμμών</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">La luz viaja en una línea recta disposición 
ardiente de la vela</string>
          </title>
          <language>x-none</language>
          <description>
            <string language="fr">Première illustration sur trois montrant que la  lumière voyage en ligne droite. Cette illustration montre l'installation en utilisant une bougie brûlante, des écrans et une ficelle.</string>
            <string language="en">First of three illustrations showing that light travels in a straight line. This illustration shows the setup using a burning candle, screens and a string.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">bougie brûlante</string>
            <string language="en">burning candle</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">lumière</string>
            <string language="en">Light</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">voie d'accès</string>
            <string language="en">path</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">rayon</string>
            <string language="en">ray</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">écrans</string>
            <string language="en">screens</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">ligne droite</string>
            <string language="en">straight line</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="fr">ficelle</string>
            <string language="en">string</string>
          </keyword>
          <structure>
            <source>structureValues</source>
            <value>atomic</value>
          </structure>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Zuerst von drei Abbildungen, die zeigen, daß 
Licht in eine gerade Geraden reist. Diese Abbildung zeigt die 
Installation mit einer brennenden Kerze, Bildschirmen und einer 
Zeichenkette.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Primeiramente de três ilustrações que mostram 
que a luz viaja em uma linha reta. Esta ilustração mostra a 
instalação usando uma vela ardente, telas e uma corda.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">In primo luogo di tre illustrazioni che indicano 
che la luce viaggia in una linea retta. Questa illustrazione 
mostra la messa a punto usando una candela burning, gli schermi e una 
stringa.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πρώτα τριών απεικονίσεων που δείχνουν ότι ελαφριά 
ταξίδια σε μια ευθεία γραμμή. Αυτή η απεικόνιση εμφανίζει 
την οργάνωση χρησιμοποιώντας ένα καίγοντας κερί, τις οθόνες και 
μια συμβολοσειρά.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Primero de tres ilustraciones que muestran que la
luz viaja en una línea recta. Esta ilustración muestra la 
disposición usando una vela ardiente, pantallas y una cadena.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">brennende Kerze</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Licht</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Pfad</string>
          </keyword>

          </keyword>
